name: In Vein
description:
Created with 7 people during the Global game jam 2020. This game was created in 48 hours and is prone to bugs and issues. 

You are in a capsule-shaped ship, shrunken down to be the only hope for a patient infected with a deadly virus. Keep the patient alive for as long as possible. Blow up viruses, heal infected cells. How far can you get without dying or running out of time!

Donations would be split among st all 7 developers evenly.

Cast
